name: besottedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you are completely in love with someone or something and always thinking about them: He was besottedly in love with the girl for many years before he finally worked up the courage to ask her on a date. The couple met in a dentist's waiting room and fell besottedly for each other right away. Related word
besotted
More examplesFewer examplesHe gazed at her besottedly from across the room. She fell besottedly in love with music when she picked up a guitar as a young child.
